Package com.github.actionfx.core.view.graph

Enum ControlProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ControlProperties>
      • com.github.actionfx.core.view.graph.ControlProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ControlProperties>
    public enum ControlProperties
extends java.lang.Enum<ControlProperties>
    Enumeration for addressing properties inside a Control in a more general fashion.

    ActionFX introduces the concept of a "user value", which is a value set by the user (text in TextField, selected entries in a TableView or entry entry selected or entered in a ComboBox).

    Aside from the "user value", a control has further properties relevant for developers, e.g. the displayed "items" in a TableView.

    Because JavaFX holds these values in differently named properties, this enumeration acts as a generalization for referring to these different types of properties in a unique fashion.

    Author:
    koster

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      ITEMS_OBSERVABLE_LIST
      Multiple entries/items inside a control, e.g.
      SINGLE_VALUE_PROPERTY
      Single value property of a control, e.g.
      USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE
      The user value is a value entered/selected by the user.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • SINGLE_VALUE_PROPERTY

        public static final ControlProperties SINGLE_VALUE_PROPERTY
        Single value property of a control, e.g. TextInputControl.textProperty() (which is the "user value" at the same time), or TreeView.rootProperty() (which is not the "user value" - here it is one or multiple selected entries in the tree view).

        Properties of this type are stored either in a Property.

      • ITEMS_OBSERVABLE_LIST

        public static final ControlProperties ITEMS_OBSERVABLE_LIST
        Multiple entries/items inside a control, e.g. items in a TableView or ChoiceBox. Properties of this type are stored in a ObservableList.

      • USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE

        public static final ControlProperties USER_VALUE_OBSERVABLE
        The user value is a value entered/selected by the user. The property for a user value can be equal to the SINGLE_VALUE_PROPERTY or ITEMS_OBSERVABLE_LIST, but it can be also one or many selected values through a SelectionModel.

        The user value is stored as implementation of Observable, which can be e.g. a Property or a ObservableList.

        public static ControlProperties[] values()

    System.out.println(c);
